title: InjecAgent: Benchmarking Indirect Prompt Injections in Tool-Using Agents
notes: Defines indirect prompt-injection benchmark patterns relevant to tool-calling agents.

title: The Dangers of Indirect Prompt Injection Attacks on LLM-based Autonomous Web Navigation Agents: A Demonstration
notes: Demonstrates operational tool-misuse chains from hostile web/tool content.

title: Trojan Source: Invisible Vulnerabilities
notes: Establishes hidden/bidi source ambiguity class and exploitability.

title: Formalizing and Benchmarking Prompt Injection Attacks and Defenses
notes: Provides benchmark-backed attack/defense framing for tool-integrated agents.

title: Model Context Protocol Security Best Practices
notes: Defines per-client consent and confused-deputy mitigation guidance.

title: MCP Basic Authorization
notes: Specifies authorization boundaries and identity controls for MCP clients/servers.

title: NIST AI 600-1 Generative AI Profile
notes: Operational control baseline for GenAI risk mitigation and auditing.

title: OWASP Top 10 for LLM and GenAI Applications (2025)
notes: Operational threat classes and controls for LLM-integrated applications.
